name: The Beach
desc: You are standing on a sandy beach with the sound of waves in the distance.

name: The Lighthouse
desc: You see a tall lighthouse standing on the cliff above you.

name: The Forest
desc: You are surrounded by tall trees in a dense forest.

name: The Cave
desc: You enter a dark and damp cave.

name: The Garden
desc: You find yourself in a beautiful garden filled with blooming flowers.

name: The River
desc: You come across a peaceful river flowing through the forest.

name: The Waterfall
desc: You see a majestic waterfall cascading down from the cliffs above.

name: The Chamber
desc: You enter a dark and mysterious chamber with ancient markings on the walls.

name: The Meadow
desc: You find yourself in a lush meadow filled with colorful wildflowers.

name: The Castle
desc: You see a grand castle in the distance, surrounded by a moat.

name: The Cavern
desc: You are in a dark and eerie cavern, with stalactites and stalagmites all around you.

name: The Tower
desc: You see a tall tower rising up in the distance, its spire piercing the sky.
